description:
After Akagi won his first game of Mahjong, Yasuoka has already set up a match for him. It`s three days away but Akagi wants to play sooner. He is quickly called in ahead the rival gang he`s supposed to challenge and they want to make a deal however during the meeting, Akagi meets a mysterious blind man who turns out to be more than a stranger.
Source: crunchyroll
